hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUCKUP_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: 备份的文件目录 号码

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/usr/bin/env bash ## 为了任务结束不关闭vagrant BUILD_NUMBER2=${BUILD_NUMBER} BUILD_NUMBER=dontkillme set -x cd ~/gnuhub/git/ansible.ubuntu.phabricator # 全新安装 #vagrant destroy -f vagrant halt -f vagrant up --provision
# 开始恢复
vagrant ssh -c "sudo su -l root -c '/vagrant/phabricator.restore.sh ${BUCKUP_NUMBER}'"
# 保存jenkins此时配置 jenkins.cli get-job phabricator.restore > phabricator.restore.xml
# 防止本地没有提交代码 git add . git commit -a -m "jenkins backup" # 用分支名与jenkins build对应 git checkout -b restore_${BUILD_NUMBER} git push origin HEAD # 回到主开发分支 git checkout master
